ihatha ki pa්radeshiya deshapalanagnyayan me anuhasin itha keti kalayak thula jathika thalaye ‘muhunu’ bawata pathwana athara, le urumaya pa්radhana deshapalanika sudusukama washayen salakana sajith pe්ramadasa wanno, anagatha rajya nayakathwayata ‘nila’ sudusukam labathi.rate deshapalanaya thindu karana, paradu darannage pa්radhana bhumikawa madhya ayithikaruwange ayithiyata pathwa dan kalak gathaweyi. 60 dashakaye di madhya anawashya andamin rate deshapalanayata angili gasathi ya yana chodanawa yatathe sirimawo bandaranayaka mathiniya rate pa්radhana madhya aayathanaya rajasanthaka kalaya.
